attributes.action: Life sentence= lifetime in jail for terrorists
attributes.additional_details:
That we the British people wish to make a stand against any person foreign OR domestic who may by choice or coercion take action against this country or any country within the EU of a terrorist nature.
Should they be  found guilty then they shall be imprisoned for their entire remaining lifetime without the possibility of parole in a purpose built facility that is entirely funded by the country that they originate from!
